name: Lady of the Lake (RPG Demo)
description:
An old school turn-based JRPG-style video game in the world of King Arthur. 

You start with Vivian, Merlin's apprentice. Vivian starts with a simple quest and finds herself entangled in multiple possible adventures, such as saving kids who were kidnapped by goblins.

You may recruit monsters and other important Arthurian characters to your team. The first monster that joins your team determines what other monsters can join the team.

This demo has two to four hours of the story. The full game is currently unpublished and it will take six to twelve hours to beat it.

Requirements
  • OS: Windows R 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2GB or more
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: Installation needs 900 MB.
  • Additional Notes: 1280×768 or better

Developed with RPG Maker MV.
